title: Swarm Intelligence & Multi-Blade Strategy
description: Collaborative models for high-entropy agent systems.

principles.gillette_razor_model: Agents are ephemeral and fade quickly; a multi-blade swarm ensures session continuity and sharpness.
principles.json_fruit_harvesting: Structured trees (JSON) allow for precise context extraction without bloating the window.
principles.alias_harvesting: Use $$ prefix to access virtualized swarm tools and tree aliases.
